name: Next Note
description:
TURN ON FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

Tomorrow is a big day for you; the day of your music exam. So naturally you study really hard until the last moments. Your head is filled with notes and chords, thus making you have a "nightmare" when you sleep. A "nightmare", where you play through the music exam. Don't worry though it's all just a nightmare.

Controls are really simple:

The Right arrow & The Left arrow (to move right and left)

or

A & D (to move right and left)
